content.rendered:
A limited edition of around 100 bottles celebrating Japanese hospitality. This whisky has been matured for 25 years in the finest Oloroso sherry casks. The seal on the bottle is a Mizuhiki, a five corded knot symbolising the joining of hands.

Using traditional Washi paper, depicting the bamboo forests of Yamazaki, and coming in a Paulownia wood case, it is the perfect gift.

excerpt.rendered:
Distillery: Yamazaki
Whisky Origin: Japanese
Alcohol Strength: 43.30%
Bottle Size: 70cl
Weight: 3 Kg
